rules.prepare:
export LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -Wl,-z,defs -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,-O1"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
cat << EOF > build.ini [constants] arch = '$BOLT_HOST_TYPE'
[binaries] c = arch + '-gcc' cpp = arch + '-g++' strip = arch + '-strip' ld = arch + '-ld' ar = arch + '-ar' objcopy = arch + '-objcopy' pkgconfig = arch + '-pkg-config' EOF
meson setup \ --prefix=/tools \ --buildtype=debugoptimized \ --native-file=tools.ini \ _build
